name: Teeshop-scaffold
body:
# Welcome to Teeshop/Pro

This is the start of a basic rails project for Teespring Pro. 

## PROJECT UPDATES

### June 4th
- Added INSPINIA admin theme
- Made all admin controllers inside login
- Redirected homepage to login
- Changed the admin theme to make it a little more Teespring

### June 3rd
- Rails app scaffolded
- Bootstrap working
- Basic storefront layout rendering
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
